title: Chettinad crab curry
description: When I arrived in Tamil Nadu from the north of India and found fabulous seafood all down the Coromandel coast, it was like I’d come home. This combination of whole crab, coconut and tamarind with curry leaves, tomatoes, chilli and spices is going on the menu...
ingredients: 25g/1oz fresh or frozen coconut flesh, blended in a food processor or grated
2 tbsp chopped dried kokum (available from specialist Indian stores)
1 tsp jaggery or soft brown sugar
